ryad.games.ergoengine.system
Class PhysicsSystem

java.lang.Object
  ryad.games.ergoengine.system.PhysicsSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener, Subsystem<PhysicsComponent>
public class PhysicsSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subsystem<PhysicsComponent>, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener

Wraps up box2D and adds some higher level functionality. Manages physics components. TODO: I really want to make this class have a ton more options for creating physics objects vs having the create functions that are currently implemented.

Author:
xealgo
